text: was a Japanese manga writer and artist. He was best known for manga series A Distant Neighborhood (1998-1999), The Summit of the Gods (2000-2003) and A Zoo in Winter (2005-2007). He was born in Tottori, Tottori Prefecture. Taniguchi died on 11 February 2017 in Tokyo, at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Japanese manga artists Category:Japanese writers
title: Jiro Taniguchi
